txt.en: 'I am sad to hear it, but I cannot blame her. O, the impetuousness of youth! I wish her son had not besmirched my honour, but I could not allow such a challenge to go unanswered. A sword-trial was the only true means to settle the matter, and the boy lost. I am sorry for that, but I could do naught else. I hope his mother comes to understand that my hands were tied, though I know the grief of a parent is a sharp and lasting thing.'
